text: Lye is the name of different things: *Lye is a corrosive basic solution used for glass and soap making. It may have in it: **sodium hydroxide (soda lye) or **less commonly, potassium hydroxide (potash lye). *Lye, West Midlands is the name of a small town in England, between Dudley and Stourbridge in the Black Country, Dudley Metropolitan Borough, West Midlands (it was in Worcestershire). *Lye is a commune of the Indre d√©partement, in France.
title: Lye
